name: OCC ARTISAN SELECTION
description:
The Perfect gift or introduction to OCC's speciality coffee at a super-discount price !

All OCC coffee is 100% Arabica, lovingly hand roast on Foundry Lane, Ouseburn Valley, in small batches or microlots and always ethically sourced!

You will receive In the box :
1 x 250g Foundry No.1 - Our celebrated house blend. 100% Arabica beans from Brasil, El Salvador and Sumatra.
1 x 250g of Pure Lintong Toba - Our signature roast Single Origin coffee.
1 x 250g of our current Seasonal Special

**Plus**
1 x 100g of varied Single Origin roasts. These small batches will often be part of our own sampling and selection process allowing customers to be the very first to try upcoming OCC seasonal specials and future favourites !

THIS BOX OFFERS APROX. 25% SAVING

Sent securely via Next Day courier service, recorded & tracked. This parcel will need to be signed for

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please allow up to 48hrs for us to prepare your order fresh. 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* Choose below to receive our coffee as fresh roast beans or have your delivery ground to order.

name: - - OCC FOUNDRY SUBSCRIPTION  - - (3 MONTHS)
description:
3 MONTH SUBSCRIPTION
(£7.50 per month)

The Foundry Subscription offer is for all our customers who would like a regular supply of fresh roast gourmet coffee to enjoy at home or the office at a discount price and with something extra to look forward to...

All OCC coffee is hand roast on Foundry Lane, bagged fresh within an hour of resting. Foundry No.1 is just that, our finest blend. The coffee we proudly serve in our shop and street bars. 

Each month you will receive direct to your door:
1 x 250g of Foundry No.1
**PLUS**

THIS OFFERS A MONTHLY 20% SAVING

name: . OCC COFFEE CLUB SUBSCRIPTION . (3 MONTHS)
description:
3 MONTH SUBSCRIPTION
(£15 per month)

Our premium Coffee Club subscription allows you to enjoy the world's finest coffee, hand roast, bagged fresh and delivered to your door each and every month!

Along with all the best of our 'off the shelf' gourmet blends and seasonal specials, you will also have an exclusive opportunity to share and enjoy the product of our in-house micro-roasts sampling the abundant variety of speciality coffee we source for our monthly cupping sessions which inform, excite & inspire our future selections.

Each month you will recieve in the box:

1 x 250g Seasonal Special
1 x 250g Foundry No.1 - Our celebrated house blend
3 x 100g of exclusive and varied Specials, Microlots and cupping samples.

Every month your Club Box will also include a special detailed fact sheet, origin profile and cupping notes to accompany each coffee.

THIS OFFERS APROX. 20% SAVING ON SHELF PRICES

Sent securely via Next Day courier service, recorded & tracked. This parcel will need to be signed for

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please allow up to 48hrs for us to prepare your order fresh. 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* Choose below to receive our coffee as fresh roast beans or have your delivery ground to order.

name: OCC CYCLING JERSEY
description:
PRE-ORDERS HAVE NOW CLOSED - WE WILL HAVE A HANDFUL OF EXTRA'S AVAILABLE IN MAY. E-MAIL US FOR DETAILS

Highly limited replica race Jersey based on the kit we have produced  for Karl Juan Denton and the 2013 national and international race season.

features OCC logo front and back with Sleeve logo detail and Northumberland Stripe. 3 rear pockets, 16 cm Hidden zip, silicon band on rear elastic bottom seam.

 The cut is less sculpted than 'Matrix' jersey Karl wears.

A two-sided elastic fabric containing LYCRA® fibres developed for high-quality sportswear. It is used in the production of premium jerseys and accessories which boast excellent ability to maintain a consistent body temperature with a high inner pile for comfort.

We're limiting production to just 30 and available as pre-order. We aim to place the order mid-march with an estimated turn around of 6 weeks. in future production runs we hope to offer a Female Jersey but for now these first 30 are Male pattern. 

Please scroll through images for Sizing Guide and choose form the menu below.

Every order will be dispatched via a recorded courier service and includes an exclusive bag of ground coffee.

name: El SALVADOR SHB/RFA (250g) - SEASONAL SPECIAL
description:
SINGLE ORIGIN COFFEE

FINCA LA JOYA / EL SALVADOR SHB / RFA CERTIFIED

Produce of Finca La Joya in western El Salvador. The farm's organic growing practice serves to protect biodiversity, ecological management of soil employing non-chemical pest control and has attained a high degree of social responsibility recognised by the estates RainForest Certification.

This 100% pure Bourbon crop is graded SHB (Strictly Hard Bean) a term reserved for the beans grown above 4,500 ft. favoured for their consistency and more intense taste attributes. 

Our medium roast offers a rich buttery sweetness with nutty chocolates complimented by a malty caramel finish. This is an extremely versatile coffee with a beautifully well balanced acidity in both drip filter or espresso.


Sent securely via Next Day courier service, recorded & tracked.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please allow up to 48hrs for us to prepare your order fresh. 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* Choose below to receive our coffee as fresh roast beans or have your delivery ground to order.

name: FOUNDRY No.1 ESPRESSO BLEND (250g)
description:
ARTISAN ESPRESSO BLEND

Rainforest Alliance Certified

40% EL SALVADOR RFA SHG, 40% BRASIL SANTOS 2/3, 20% PURE SUMATRA LINTONG TOBA

We spent a long time selecting beans and refining various blends ahead of opening on Foundry Lane in 2012 and of course we won't ever stop exploring the world's coffee so this really marks the beginning of the OCC story.

FOUNDRY No.1 is just that; our finest blend.

All 3 beans stand up as Single Origin Specials in their own right, offering excellent value for money. Each roasted separately (Medium to dark) and blended by hand, resulting in what we feel is an outstanding everyday coffee, perfect for Espresso, Frenchpress and Stove-tops alike.

Well balanced acidity in the cup. Rich, nutty, praline chocolate flavours, full bodied earthiness with that Lintong spark ! This is the celebrated coffee we proudly serve from our shop and street bars. 

Sent securely via Next Day courier service, recorded & tracked. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please allow up to 48hrs for us to prepare your order fresh. 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

name: COFFEE JOHNNY - SPECIAL EDITION - LIMTED LOTS - (250g)
description:
SPECIAL EDITION - LIMTED LOTS

Originally blended to celebrating 150 years of the world famous Blaydon Races in 2012

Our premium Arabica Bourbon blend takes it’s name from the local Blacksmith and flamboyant bare knuckle boxer John Oliver, who gained notoriety throughout Newcastle for his towering height and trademark white top hat who. 

Immortalised in painting, verse and folklore No-one can now be sure exactly why Mr Oliver earned his nickname ‘Coffee Johnny’ but we suspect he liked a brew of one sort or another, so raise your cup to Coffee Johnny 1829-1900

Premium blend. Rich nutty-chocolate Brazilian coffee with smooth full bodied beans lightly roasted from Costa Rica. well balanced low acidity. Great as either a drip filter or espresso.

Sent securely via Next Day courier service, recorded & tracked. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please allow up to 48hrs for us to prepare your order fresh. 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

name: SUMATRA PURE LINTONG TOBA (250g)
description:
SINGLE ORIGIN COFFEE

Sumatra Pure Lintong Toba

A very special, premium coffee bean, with an incredible story, well renowned among coffee connoisseurs for its almost blue colour when pulped and farmed only in the Northern Sumatran micro region of Lintong, on the South West side of Toba Lake.

It is not uncommon for Lintong coffees to be mixed with other regions of Sumatra or even Sulawesi and Java and labeled with the Sumatra Mandheling name. While these mixed coffees are still specialty grade and can taste wonderful, there is undoubtedly a difference between a specific, unblended Lintong and a blended Mandheling.

The coffee-growing process in Lintong is steeped in generations of tradition and central to the culture of the Batak people who farm this remarkable coffee bean. Chemical fertilizer is virtually unknown to the Batak and they use manual pulley systems to well the water feeding their Microlot farms using manure from their livestock as natural fertilizer. 'Organic' farming is simply the traditional method there.

Once their coffee is harvested, it is processed using a wet-hulling method called “giling basah” which gives the coffee more body and the character that makes it so appealing and unique. 

We offer a medium roast for our Pure Lintong, exuding Grapefruit-Citrus, Heavy-bodied Treacle and zesty chilly characteristics. Truly magnificent. 

Sent securely via Next Day courier service, recorded & tracked.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please allow up to 48hrs for us to prepare your order fresh. 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

name: DECAF (250g)
description:
SINGLE ORIGIN COFFEE

El Salvador SHB - Rain Forest Alliance Certified

We've been listening closely to our customers and without a doubt the one thing that keeps coming up is the lack of good Decaf coffee .. so here it is !

We have sourced the same Arabica beans from El Savador that we use in our Foundry Blend, decaffeinated using a chemical free CO2 (essentially carbonated water) process. This is incredibly kind to the coffee preserving the life and flavour in the beans. A slightly different, darker roast and we suggest slightly longer brewing/extraction times to achieve the same buttery sweetness, well balanced pleasing acidity in the cup and distinct Almond notes we enjoy in the unprocessed beans.

We stand by this 100% as gourmet coffee and you can drink it all day long. We guarrantee this will change all your preconceptions of 'decaf' 

Sent securely via Next Day courier service, recorded & tracked.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please allow up to 48hrs for us to prepare your order fresh. 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
